heroSlides.title: Transform Your Potential into Professional Excellence
heroSlides.subtitle: Where Academic Rigor Meets Industry Relevance
heroSlides.description: Join 3,200+ students at Bangladesh's premier technology institute. Experience world-class education with 100% placement assistance and industry-aligned curriculum.

heroSlides.title: Building Bangladesh's Future Leaders
heroSlides.subtitle: Excellence Through Innovation Since 2002
heroSlides.description: With 80+ expert faculty members and state-of-the-art facilities, we've graduated 1,300+ successful professionals who are now leading in top companies.

heroSlides.title: Your Success Story Starts Here
heroSlides.subtitle: 800+ Graduates Successfully Placed
heroSlides.description: From classroom to boardroom - our alumni are making their mark in leading tech companies with average salary growth of 150% within 2 years.
